events.message: The customer reported a car accident that occurred at an intersection, requesting to file a damage claim for their vehicle.
The claim was reviewed and categorised under 'Auto Accident' due to the involvement of a vehicle collision and property damage.
An experienced claims agent was assigned to handle the auto accident claim and assist the customer through the process.
The customer was informed that their claim for the vehicle collision has been officially acknowledged and logged into the system.
Customer was asked to submit police reports, photos of the accident, and repair estimates for the damaged vehicle to proceed.
All requested documents including the police report and photos were successfully submitted by the customer for review.
The claims team began investigation into the details of the vehicle collision and verified the authenticity of the submitted documents.
Investigation concluded confirming fault of the other party and validation of the damages claimed on the vehicle.
A settlement offer covering the repair costs of the damaged car was proposed to the customer with clear terms.
The customer responded positively to the settlement offer and expressed satisfaction with the handling of their claim.
The claim was officially approved following acceptance of the settlement terms by the customer.
Payment for the approved vehicle repairs was processed and issued to the customerâ€™s designated account.
The auto accident claim was closed after confirming receipt of payment and resolution of all claim-related issues.
All case files and documents related to the vehicle collision claim were archived for future reference and compliance.
